offences.offenceWording:
On 30/06/2021 at TESCO STORES LIMITED, NEWCASTLE ROAD, # ATM, TRENT VALE, STOKE-ON-TRENT, CITY OF STOKE-ON-TRENT UK ST4 6PL you, stole 2 bottles of wine, to the value of £28, belonging to Tesco
'Contrary to section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.'
 -- CCCJS CODE: 'TH68010'

On 28/06/2021 at TESCO STORES LIMITED, NEWCASTLE ROAD, # ATM, TRENT VALE, STOKE-ON-TRENT, CITY OF STOKE-ON-TRENT UK ST4 6PL you, stole 4 bottles of wine, to the value of £36  belonging to Tesco
'Contrary to section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.'
 -- CCCJS CODE: 'TH68010'

On 29/06/2021 at TESCO STORES LIMITED, NEWCASTLE ROAD, # ATM, TRENT VALE, STOKE-ON-TRENT, CITY OF STOKE-ON-TRENT UK ST4 6PL you, stole 4 bottles of wine, to the value of £34, belonging to Tesco
'Contrary to section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.'
 -- CCCJS CODE: 'TH68010'

On 21/06/2021 at HANFORD in the city of STOKE-ON-TRENT, attempted to rob Lorraine Anderson of her purse, money and mobile phone of a value unknown.

'Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.'
 -- CCCJS CODE: 'TH68023A'

On 21/06/2021 at HANFORD in the city of STOKE-ON-TRENT, attempted to rob Woods Bakery of cash of a value unknown.

'Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.'
 -- CCCJS CODE: 'TH68023A'

On 21/06/2021 at HANFORD IN THE CITY OF  STOKE-ON-TRENT, assaulted Lorraine Anderson by beating her.

'Contrary to section 39 of the Criminal Justice Act 1988.'
 -- CCCJS CODE: 'CJ88116'

offences.offenceShortTitle: Fail to surrender to police / court bail at the appointed time
offences.offenceWording: On 24/6/21    at Newcastle under Lyme failed without reasonable cause to surrender to custody NSJC  Magistrates’ Court having been released on bail in criminal proceedings on 8/6/21 at police station

offences.offenceShortTitle: Fail to answer to court / police bail as    soon as practicable
offences.offenceWording: On 24/6/21 at  Newcastle under Lyme failed without reasonable cause to surrender at NSJC Magistrates’ Court or as soon after that time as was reasonably practicable, having been released on bail in criminal proceedings on 8/6/21 at police station

On 08th June 2021 at Stoke on Trent in the county of Staffordshire, stole razor blades and beard trimmer to the value of £75 belonging to Boots Chemist.
'Contrary to section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.'
